entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is the main character of the story. He is described as getting up and moving over to the windows, looking out at the thin mist. He is also shown to be scared-looking when he sees his own reflection in the dark glass.

entities.name: marble fireplace
entities.description: The marble fireplace is a feature of the Prime Minister's office, described as 'handsome' and facing the long sash windows.

entities.name: sash windows
entities.description: The sash windows are a feature of the Prime Minister's office, described as being firmly closed against the unseasonable chill.

relationships.description: The Prime Minister is standing in front of the marble fireplace, looking out at the thin mist through the sash windows.
The Prime Minister is standing in front of the sash windows, looking out at the thin mist through them.
